rev.comment: Are you kidding me? The edits on this page I have done are legitimate. Take a look before you undo. Jesus, brown people suck.
Fixed 404'd link and moved it to the bottom. Although it gives much information about islam, it doesn't give much about how the niggers twisted islam, or how they're clearly inferior to real muslims.
Moved link from emtecfilms from criticism to NOI links. the link resolves to a page selling a DVD purporting to PROVE the legitimacy of farrakhanism. Niggers were trying to trick us. WHITE POWER!!!!
of corse the ADL is jewish- this doesn't need to be stated in the article/* Charges of antisemitism */
